Class AnimatedEntity2D

java.lang.Object
vista2D.AnimatedEntity2D
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnimatedDagger2D, AnimatedGiratory2D, AnimatedPickedCell, GameCharacterAnimated2D
public class AnimatedEntity2D extends Object
Clase que representa graficamente una entidad del juego con una animacion asociada
Author:
Guillermo Lazzurri
